Pre-Game Insights: Dodgers' bullpen has been a strength throughout the season.
Dodgers will rely heavily on high-leverage relievers to secure the pennant.
Five games in the NLCS have been decided by at least four runs without any lead changes.
Managers are becoming more aggressive with high-leverage relievers once they catch a lead.
Dodgers' relievers have faced Mets batters multiple times, but Mets relievers have faced Dodgers batters frequently.
